coverage_details.organ_transplant: Corneal, Bone, Spinal, Heart, Liver, Kidney, Bone Marrow & Cochlear Implant. Excludes the organ cost itself
coverage_details.dental_general: Dental Scaling is covered twice a year. Flap surgery, abscesses, infected cyst, maxillofacial surgeries and related anesthesia covered under annual limit. Hospitalization and anesthesia for inpatient dental operations not part of dental benefit.
coverage_details.maternity: Covered - Up to Annual Limit. Vitamins and tonics for pregnant women and cases of vitamin deficiency covered. Maternity for employee's mother not covered. Newborn coverage under mother for 60 days.
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00 (all lens types covered up to optical limit, age limit 0-999)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for in-patient and out-patient services, except for services with sub-limits or specific outlined exceptions.
coverage_details.special_instructions: All types of medical equipment for the disabled member are fully covered up to SAR 5,000 per member/year. SFDA/FDA non-registered meds covered if prescribed and justified. Treatment for pre-existing/chronic conditions covered. Psychiatric and psychological treatments up to annual limit. Osteoarthritis and injections covered. All types of vaccinations including hajji and seasonal, and other MOH-requested. Home health care, ambulance, artificial limbs (up to max limit), allergy testing/diagnosis/treatment, laser for non-cosmetic use, acne, alopecia, medical supplies/disposables, repatriation of remains (SAR 10,000), approval required for services with sub-limits, medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.

coverage_details.outpatient_deductible_mpn: Nil (except 20% up to 300 SR at Sulaiman Al Habib Hospitals outside Jeddah)
coverage_details.outpatient_deductible_hospitals: Nil (except 20% up to 300 SR at Sulaiman Al Habib Hospitals outside Jeddah)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit and all MOH seasonal/hajji/other required vaccinations for all ages
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Corneal, Bone, Spinal, Heart, Liver, Kidney, Bone Marrow & Cochlear Implant. Excludes the organ cost itself
coverage_details.dental_general: Dental Scaling covered twice a year. Flap surgery, abscesses, infected cyst, maxillofacial surgeries and related anesthesia covered under annual limit. Hospitalization and anesthesia for inpatient dental operations not part of dental benefit.
coverage_details.maternity: Covered - Up to Annual Limit. Vitamins and tonics for pregnant women and cases of vitamin deficiency covered. Maternity for employee's mother not covered. Newborn coverage under mother for 60 days.
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00 (all lens types covered up to optical limit, age limit 0-999)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for out/in-patient except for services with sub-limits and specific exclusions.
coverage_details.special_instructions: All types of medical equipment for disabled up to SAR 5,000 per member/year. SFDA/FDA non-registered meds covered if prescribed/justified. Pre-existing/chronic conditions covered. Psychiatric, mental and psychological treatments covered up to annual limit. Home health care, ambulance, artificial limbs (to maximum limit), allergy testing/diagnosis/treatment, medical supplies/disposables, repatriation of remains (SAR 10,000). Approval required for services with sub-limits. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP for in- and out-patient except for sub-limited services; specific 'Gate Keeper' referral required at named hospitals and clinics in Jeddah.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Gate Keeper referral required for IMC, Dr. Suliman Fakeeh group in Jeddah, Dr. Suliman Al Habib hospitals (Jeddah/Rabig), MY Clinic (Jeddah). Medical equipment for disabled (up to 5,000 SAR/person/year). SFDA/FDA non-registered meds if prescribed/justified. Chronic/pre-existing covered. Psychiatric & psychological treatments at annual limit. Osteoarthritis, home health care, ambulance, artificial limbs up to limit, all home health care from annual limit (needs PRC review approval). Medical supplies/disposables, repatriation to home country SAR 10,000, approval needed for services with sub-limits. Medication limit equals pre-auth approval limit.
